keyword: how many calories in 1 teaspoon honey
title: How Many Calories in 1 Teaspoon Honey?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in 1 teaspoon honey, including carbs, sugars, full nutrition breakdown per serving, and simple tweaks for recipes.
h1: How Many Calories in 1 Teaspoon Honey?
assumptions: Pure honey, standard serving size of approximately 7g per teaspoon; no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by honey type (e.g., raw, clover), brand, and measurement accuracy. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of honey provides about 21 calories, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Mix into herbal tea (tea adds 0 kcal)

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 teaspoon honey?

faqs.a: Yes, about 5.8g of sugars per teaspoon, nearly all carbs.

faqs.q: How many carbs in 1 tsp honey?
Does honey have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Negligible amounts: 0g protein and 0g fat per teaspoon.

faqs.q: Calories in 1 tbsp honey vs teaspoon?
faqs.a: A tablespoon (3 tsp) has about 64 calories.
